mapper.sql: C_ANSID, C_UID, C_QID, C_ANS_TIME, C_ANS_CONTEXT, C_IS_DELETE, C_LAST_UPDATE, C_IS_FOLD
mapper.select: select count(C_ANSID) from faq.TB_ANSWER where TO_DAYS(C_LAST_UPDATE) = TO_DAYS(NOW())

select C_ANSID, TB_ANSWER.C_UID, C_QID, C_ANS_TIME, C_ANS_CONTEXT, C_LAST_UPDATE, TB_USER.C_USERNAME from faq.TB_ANSWER left join TB_USER on TB_USER.C_UID=TB_ANSWER.C_UID where TB_ANSWER.C_QID=#{qid} and TB_ANSWER.C_IS_DELETE=0 and TB_ANSWER.C_IS_FOLD=0
mapper.insert: insert into faq.TB_ANSWER(C_ANSID, C_UID, C_QID, C_ANS_TIME, C_ANS_CONTEXT, C_IS_DELETE, C_LAST_UPDATE, C_IS_FOLD) values(#{cAnsid}, #{cUid}, #{cQid}, NOW(), #{cAnsContext}, 0, NOW(), 0)
